item.title: Vue vs React Part I (Vue's prolific simplicity)
item.description: Yep, it’s the beginning of 2021 and it’s one of those posts! I decided there aren’t enough of them on the internet and thought i might indulge in writing one ðŸ˜†. This comes from my perspective as a beginner in both frameworks and i will be talking about vue 2 not vue 3, i haven’t rolled out, ported or even read anything on vue 3 yet. Initially i wanted to write a single post, but there’s a lot of example code to cover, so i decided to split it in three instead.
